website_summaries.verdict: A first-rate twin bed frame that blends style and function.
pros: High-grade steel in attractive black finish
Vertical clearance of 13" for storage underneath
cons: Middle legs may not touch the ground

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with this bed frame!!!
customer_reviews.text: You need to be very careful when unpacking this bed frame, I have a really deep cut in my thumb when I was pulling it out of the box, there is a very sharp metal protruding exactly by the rounded corner where you grab it to pull it out from the box. This product need better quality control or else more people can get serious injuries from this. I was so mad that I wanted to post a picture of my bloody thumb but decided not to because Amazon might not post my review.
customer_reviews.author: Linn

customer_reviews.title: Nickname is “Squeaky”
customer_reviews.text: This thing started out so quiet, but fast forward 6 months later, it’s squeaking up a storm! Great.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Omg buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought my kids several bed sets all of which they ended up breaking due to cheap materials but I have bought 3 of these so far and they have stood the test of time! I have a older son who literally throws himself on the bed as if it were a wrestling ring and this thing still hasnt broken! I love how easy it is to fold up and move too. No more taking bed frames apart, no more broken box springs or lumpy mattresses due to unbalanced support!
customer_reviews.author: Unique

customer_reviews.title: is easy to fold up
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer for us. Our storage space is limited, but we wanted an upgrade from air mattresses for our guests. This folds up very compact, is easy to fold up, and provides a really great base for guest bedding. We used it with the Best Price Mattress 4" Trifold Memory Foam Mattress, Twin XL, which worked great. Our guests (aged 70 yrs old) both said they slept incredibly well. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Earle

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the Zinus one wasn't 2 day shipping and I'm glad I did. The set up was very easy. You unfold it, lock the legs, put both pieces together (For a full bed) and lock them together. It took maybe 5 minutes. It supports my bed and I With no sinkage and it does not move or slide when I plop down (I'm about 183 for now). I do wish it was 20 inches high, to go over my socket (Which has my router plugged in) but, whatever. Great frame. I'm surprised I don't need a box frame.
customer_reviews.author: Kwam

customer_reviews.title: Info about Headboards
customer_reviews.text: As others have written, it's extremely easy to set up - you basically just unfold it. Frame is fine, but only four stars because there is no way to attach a headboard to the frame without purchasing a separate component and no info on which component to purchase. We took a chance and got the "Zinus Headboard Bracket, Set of 2"  and it is compatible with this bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: Doris M. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Uneven
customer_reviews.text: The middle legs don’t touch the ground. I asked for a replacement which had the same problem. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Came quickly and set up easily. You just unfold and you have a perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and set up easily. You just unfold and you have a perfect platform for your mattress. It was easy to bolt them together to form a queen-sized bed. Due to our age, we no longer want a super-tall bed, so we opted not to put our boxed spring back under the mattress. This provides great support and makes the bed the right height to to be able to sit on the edge of the bed to put on shoes, yet is high enough to easily get into and out of bed. It feels very sturdy - not cheap or flimsy! We have new hardwood floors, so I bought rubber feet to go under the legs for added protection.
customer_reviews.author: Bellkatz

customer_reviews.title: Not flush with ground. Full size.
customer_reviews.text: After combining the two pieces, the middle legs do not touch the ground. Granted when you're in the bed, it's not as much of an issue but there is still a noticeable enough tilt in the middle. I'm hoping that it loosens up a bit and actually flattens, but so far it's looking like I might wind up replacing this.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Lyke

customer_reviews.title: Big guys buy this now!
customer_reviews.text: I am a big guy, so I need things to be built durable. This is awesome. Unboxed quickly. Folds out like a table. Couple of bolts and it good. Laid perfectly in my bed frame like a glove so the measurements are spot on. Again I am 6 ft and built like a lineman, this frame is rock solid.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Legs are uneven. Tried to return but Amazon refuses.
customer_reviews.author: JSP

customer_reviews.title: Regret Buying. * 2 thumbs down.
customer_reviews.text: Warning to future buyers- I bought this frame and a really great mattress on Amazon as well. The mattress slides OFF this frame just by gently touching the bed. You can’t lean on the bed or it slides the mattress off the side. I called Amazon support and they couldn’t offer any suggestions to help. I now have to go to a bed/mattress store and see if I can buy something there to make it not slide off. So this is a regret purchase and now I will have to buy a new frame if I can’t find a solution to the slip and slide. * don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Got this item today. I ordered it for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this item today. I ordered it for the guest room because I have the full sized version as well and it affords a lot of under bed storage. However, i took it out of the box and assembled (very simple) to find it doesn’t sit flat. The 4 outside legs are flat on the floor but the middle two raise up, not touching the floor. I can’t tell anything I did incorrectly on the assembly. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Ilisapeci

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mattress platform
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than expected. Easy to put together. Tall enough to slip boxes under. Short enough to sit on the mattress easily. I put a bed skirt around it. Perfect mattress platform.
customer_reviews.author: Tonia Drazkowski

customer_reviews.title: Mattress doesn’t stay put
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy unless you don’t mind your mattress moving all over the place. Pro: very tall and it keeps the mattress even. Major Con : mattress doesn’t stay put. Can’t attach to a headboard.
customer_reviews.author: Penny thoughts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this frame to use for a dog bed. Some of the reviews were discouraging but I'm so happy I bought it. It was SO easy to set up and I've had no issues with it at all. Sometimes I even sleep on it with my 4 dogs and I have zero complaints. It's serves it's purpose and is definitely one of the best pruchases I've made. Thanks for this great product, both my dogs and I are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Crosby

customer_reviews.title: It does not hold the mattress in place
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy frame. Holds our queen size mattress very well. My issue with it is the mattress slides around on it a TON. If I’m standing next to the bed and lean over it to grab something the mattress will slip 2-3 inches. It’s enough that it startled me a few times and I almost fell off the bed once because because it had slid a lot but the fluffy duvet was covering the edge. I tried to sit at the edge of the bed but the edge was not where it was supposed to be. If you don’t mind slipping, get it. If you are more prone to falling I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Green

customer_reviews.title: but every time you do so it makes annoying noise. I believe I got a defective one
customer_reviews.text: One of the legs doesn't touch the floor unless you sit on the bed, but every time you do so it makes annoying noise. I believe I got a defective one.
customer_reviews.author: Chenfei Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Sliding mattress issue - SOLVED!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great bed frame overall. It works exceptionally well with the Milliard Tri Folding Mattress. A perfect solution for a guest. It's much better than an airbed. As other reviewers mentioned, the mattress does slide a bit. So here is how to fix it. All you need is metal flat brackets, screws, nuts, and washers. All of that I bought on Amazon. The holes are already in the frame, so no drilling needed. Just attached the brackets to the frame and they will hold the mattress in place. When you need to fold the bed, you can simply fold them down. Please see the pics for references.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Can’t balance
customer_reviews.text: What happen to the center legs... they cannot balance my bed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Really nice and sturdy. I have queen matress and a box frame too which made the bed look super high, but my boyfriend and I liked it so much. I dont think you need a box frame for this. I love the fact that it has a lot of storage space underneath. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: uma

customer_reviews.title: Great frame
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how easy this frame was to put up, you just pull the legs up and lock brace in place all done. It literary took longer to get out of the box. It was packaged extremely well. I would recommend this frame to anyone,mine is twin for my computer room. I have a mattress on and is very sturdy. The only thing I will do is put pads on feet just for extra safety to my wood floor.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaMae

customer_reviews.title: King size is portable!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! No assembly! Just hand tighten the toggle device to attach the two sides. Each side of the bed just unfolds out of the box. It comes totally assembled. Very sturdy bed. I recommend buying four large shipping cardboard boxes from Walmart. Lay them flat on top of the wire mesh to create a smooth surface for your foam mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: It creates a very high bed--might want to get the lower version.
customer_reviews.text: It was so easy to set up. Simply unfold and attached the two halves together with two bolts that hand tighten. It is very sturdy and I imagine it will last for a very long time. Mine is up against the wall which is probably best since the mattress slides pretty easily on the frame--there is no lip to hold the mattress in place.
customer_reviews.author: Casual Gourmet

customer_reviews.title: It's just not a good item for kids IMO
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't order this again for my 6 year old. Thinking of returning it because it has warnings about the bed flipping if you sit on the edge and warnings about pinching. It's just not a good item for kids IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany S.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together, it was such a nice surprise how simple and quick it was. That alone gets it five stars. I'd buy this frame again. The mattress does slide around a bit to easily on it, but I don't really see that as being a big issue for sleeping on it, might be for other things though 😉
customer_reviews.author: Darth Underhill

customer_reviews.title: Rough edges will rip your mattress or cut you....
customer_reviews.text: Rough edges on metal support rods due to sloppy welding are a hazard. I almost cut my finger on one of them while setting it up. I had to place a doubled over thick blanket between the frame and my new mattress to keep the mattress from getting ripped up. Really wish I had paid attention to the reviews from those who have had the same experience. Very disappointed in the quality of this bed frame. If not for the poor workmanship, this could have been a five star frame. It was easy to assemble and seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & price!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I really like this bed frame! It was incredibly easy to assemble (no tools required) and is tall enough to store even deep storage bins beneath it. I’ve had this bed frame for a few weeks now and am very satisfied! It does not squeak at all and is quite sturdy. My only reservation is that my mattress seems to slide a little, but this can be fixed by adding grips / tape to the bed frame. All in all, a satisfied customer—Great bed frame for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Landford

customer_reviews.title: its seems extremely sturdy, i was a little worried because i thought ...
customer_reviews.text: im a college student who lives away from home. so i bought this for when i go home for the holidays or breaks so i dont have to sleep on the couch or an air mattress. its seems extremely sturdy, i was a little worried because i thought it might be a little flimsy or shaky but it isnt at all. i bought the twin which is very easy to fold and unfold on my own. so glad i bought it will definitely save me time and hassle from having ti set up and take down an air mattress every day. if yiir looking for a space sacing solution try a trifold foam mattress.
customer_reviews.author: April H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazon refuses to return this item. It is defective and unsafe
customer_reviews.text: I ignored other reviews about the middle legs of the full bed frame not touching the ground. I ordered the full bed frame and the legs don’t touch. This product is defective. The two frames do not line up together. Amazon refuses to return the item even though it is made and sold directly through them. I shop a lot on amazon and this is the first time I have ever been disappointed with their service.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Received broken product!!! ☹️
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this platform back at the beginning of the month. I had to postpone getting my new mattress until just today. I was so disappointed when i opened the box just to pull it out and see that the frame was still very broken. there were bends and scratches and a large dent. and and entire bar was broken and hanging off!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy! Easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing! And sturdy! I've lived in my apartment since February and had my bed on the floor. It's a studio and its saved me more laundry and also, space! It took me longer to move furniture out of the way than get it together. No wobble or give, no sound, and it is sturdy! So happy! Hand tighten 2 bolts and done! Had it for 2 weeks now and I feel like I'm sleeping in the clouds, definite change from the floor. I'm 5'5" and with my mattress it's just above mid thigh tall no boxpring.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Ayers

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice height - perfect for my elderly dad to use ...
customer_reviews.text: very handy as a frame to put the air mattress on when you have an adult guest who doesnt want to lie on the floor. It is a nice height - perfect for my elderly dad to use with our air mattress.
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, stable
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup, stable, no noise and lots of room underneath. Bought it for guest that stayed with us for two weeks. After their stay, one of the wire support broke. Probably need better welds.
customer_reviews.author: Elmer

customer_reviews.title: I'm 400lbs, this thing stands up to me. ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 400lbs, this thing stands up to me. I'm extremely surprised how rock solid this thing is, it doesn't even wiggle.
customer_reviews.author: Freezerburn

customer_reviews.title: Seems very sturdy, has about 11 inches of clearance for storage ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this about a week. Seems very sturdy, has about 11 inches of clearance for storage under the bed. It was EXTREMELY easy to set up, for the king size, you just fold out the legs and bolt the 2 pieces together, took about 3 minutes to set up. So far no squeaking or anything breaking even with a lot of movement. We are nearing the 500 pound wt limit for 2 sleepers (it says limit to 250 pounds per sleeper) and the frame doesn't seem to be stressed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Edges
customer_reviews.text: As others reviewed. There are very sharp edges that I’m positive are going to rip our new $600 memory foam mattress. Since it will be a horrible pain to return this thing I’m going to cover them with duct tape. If you want your mattress ripped or want to find a way to cover sharp metal edges then this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: TravelingMountainMomof5

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews and I mean A LOT before purchasing a new bed frame. I ultimately went with this once because it looked really easy to put together and offered storage underneath. I'm so glad I chose this one because it's perfect! It was insanely easy to assemble (just unfold and use 2 screws to put the 2 halves together). I was able to fit 8 storage bins underneath...yes 8! It's also very sturdy, I weigh 130 and my partner is around 300 and it could handle our combined weight just fine! It also looks nice once you have all the bedding on. I would highly recommend this bed frame!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Rousselo

customer_reviews.title: GREAT, but beware
customer_reviews.text: the frame was so easy to assemble. seriously so. however. i had read many of the reviews on this product and did find that the metal cross bars on the frame were riddled with rough, sharp little pieces where the weld wasn't "cleaned up" enough (as one reviewer noted). being forewarned i had a little piece of steel wool handy and got those sharp little edges smoothed out. otherwise the mattress most definitely would have been damaged. so pay attention before slapping the mattress on the frame. unless you don't care about your mattress warranty.
customer_reviews.author: ninjacb

customer_reviews.title: If your bed is not against the wall look out!
customer_reviews.text: Super affordable, super light weight, and super easy to assemble. Its a good quick setup for any mattress really. It comes neatly folded in a box in two pieces with instructions and hardware. The legs lock in place and the whole assembly is very sturdy. However there is one huge problem. The mattress slides! Not a little either. I dont know if its because of the mattress cover i have on it or what. This is a big deal because i have had a spa sensations foundation that does not allow the mattress to slide. So i know its possible to make these "non-slip" type. Ill give it a week or so then decide whether or not ill keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Smilin-n-whilin

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one bought. Purchased this Twin-XL with LinenSpa 10" mattress. Perfect set up.
customer_reviews.text: These frames work perfectly. I purchased a king size a while back to use with traditional Sealy Posturepedic mattress. These metal frames are well made, sturdy and easy to set up in minutes. No box spring needed. Easy to make bed simply tuck in sheets and comforter and your good to go. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, break down and store away
customer_reviews.text: Gotta be the easiest product set up in my life. Just pull out the box & fold out flat till you hear the locking mechanism click in the middle then fold out the supportive legs on both sides until they lock in place. One minute a done deal! Coupled with the 10" gel mattress it's easy for the older folk to get on and off of. This bed frame seems very solid too, no creeking! I'm saving the box for storage later in the rafters. Super happy with this purchase -
customer_reviews.author: BA

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent quality
customer_reviews.text: Pros: ease of setup Cons: consistency and quality. 'Full' size consists of two parts that are attached together. Each part has 3 sets of legs. The middle legs *do not* reach the floor. Even after adding a mattress, one has 1cm of clearance and the other has 2-3cm of clearance. If middle legs reached the floor or were at least consistent with each other I could up to 5 stars but given the current situation this is a 1-star product. Would definitely not order again and i do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: It was extremely easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it 10 stars i would. It was extremely easy to put together. You can buy the extra parts to screw into the top and bottom which make the platform able to have a headboard and footboard attached. (The pieces are $30 for each)
customer_reviews.author: Emma Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Simple packaging, easy assembly, no squeaks.
customer_reviews.text: Easiest bed frame to put together. Came in one compact box, which was a little heavy for me - as a single lady - to haul up the steps of my third-floor walk up. But, thankfully, a neighbor helped. I live in a studio and was taking apart my old bed/assembling this one by myself in my tiny apartment, so I was worried about logistics - space, how heavy it would all be, tools required...well, putting together this frame was infinitely easier than taking apart my old one. No tools required and each half of the bed is light enough I could flip it over on my own. You can do it, ladies!
customer_reviews.author: scf2120

customer_reviews.title: 1 Half of it is unlevel in the middle of it. Otherwise just fine.
customer_reviews.text: A month or so in, It's holding up. A queen is 2 pieces together. Only reason I knocked one star off was because one side does not match up to the other side in the middle. It was lifted off of the floor. I can feel the lump on that side. Not sure how it will hold up with pressure being put on it when its warped and unlevel for the middle legs. But not going to deal with returning. Other then that? its holding up at this time, easy to move compared to last heavy platform bed. Lots of space underneath for my little dogs to drag stuff under for me to find.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Bush

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: The frame arrived bent and broken. When I tried to contact Amazon through both Get Product Support and Return Item I was thrown into a loop of clicking on Phone Support or Chat. Neither appeared to lead to anything.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great basic bed frame
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed a bed frame for her first apartment this fit the ticket perfectly. I love that it folds for moving and storage later. It also has 18 inches height for storage under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: becky davis

customer_reviews.title: The longest part of the setup is taking it out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: The longest part of the setup is taking it out of the box. I'm serious. After that, it literally took just seconds to assemble and join the two halves.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob A Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Bed frame does not sit evenly on the floor
customer_reviews.text: Like some other customers have mentioned, this bed frame does not sit evenly on the floor. One of the legs is shorter than the other three which causes the bed to hit the floor every time someone sits/sleeps on it. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: we bough the 18 inch queen size bed frame, it was super easy to assemble, seems very sturdy even during sexy time, it hasnt squeaked or rocked, the only "issue" we had was it does come in 2 pieces and one didnt completely open and the middle legs didnt touch the ground but when we put our mattress on it you cant even tell or feel, with the mattress on it the legs touch the ground now so its not a big deal, with me and my husband on the bed theres about 400lbs and it has no issue holding us, plus the mattress is probably 100lbs. love all the storage underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Wisor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, no box spring! Easy set-up!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed! It is a little heavy to carry in the box but lightweight to put together. The full size has just two screws that go through the middle- don't forget to put the washer on! The legs pop open, screws together. Is very sturdy, have not had any problems with weight or squeaking. The mattress does slide around quite easily so I will probably have to purchase a carpet or mattress grip. Great substitute for a bed frame and box spring. The bed is a little tall but we have a pillowtop mattress and memory foam topper, we are both tall anyway so it's no bother. Under bed space is great if needed!
customer_reviews.author: irene

customer_reviews.title: Good price and value
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as any of this style we've tried. the pros: super convenient for moving, super stable (no creaking ever), great storage underneath. The cons: not attractive in any way, and the mattress kind of slides on top of the frame (there's nothing to hold it in place). I don't really mind pushing the mattress back in place, as the advantages outweigh the disadvantages by far. Typically, bed frames are a rip off and then squeak ridiculously. this is a great improvement for a cheap price, and you can take that extra money you save and do something productive with it.
customer_reviews.author: Apollinaire

customer_reviews.title: We love it.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, so glad I went with this bed frame. Assembly was almost nothing. Just take it out of the box and unfold it, one connector at each end to hold the two halves together. It does not squeak at all, and feels perfectly sturdy. The Zinus king mattress that I also got on amazon fits perfectly on here, and sits plenty high for our liking without any box spring.
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: Hump in Center
customer_reviews.text: There is a significant hump in the middle of this frame that makes every mattress I’ve placed on it fairly worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Nathan Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this bed frame. It’s seems like such a convenient item, but ours wouldn’t unfold all the way. The middle legs would not touch floor upon opening it. We even had to adjust the bolts to loosen it up enough for the legs to reach the floor. The weight of the mattress and my 30 pound toddler wasn’t enough. It’s also slightly larger than the mattress so it looks funny, and it’s not sturdy. It just wiggles a lot. I’m keeping since my son is still little but he’ll need a real bed before long. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAnoyn

customer_reviews.title: Could be worse I guess
customer_reviews.text: Half of the frame is crooked. It barely lines up enough to screw in the bolts that hold it together (one is at an angle because that’s the only way I could get it to go in). There’s a scratch in the side. The box was totally mangled when it arrived. I could have just gone to Walmart and gotten one in better condition (especially considering it arrived 3 days after the mattress I ordered at the same time). The only reasons it’s getting two stars is because it seems to at least be somewhat sturdy and it makes my mattress sit up very high (which is nice when you’re 5 foot 10 and have a bad back).
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at ease and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have always had a box spring so was weary about this option. It was mailed to me and I was also terrified to set it up.... It took me maybe 10 minutes to assemble. It was more difficult to move my own mattress than to assemble this. It just clicks and locks into place. I love the height of my mattress off the floor now. It is perfect and so very sturdy. No box spring needed and I now have quality sleep!!
customer_reviews.author: Kippie

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I put this up alone 1 week after double breast surgery. So if I can do it so can you! It's super sturdy. I got the queen size. I've had sex on it and it doesn't make sounds lol. I only have my mattress on it. I put storage bins of my shoes and sweaters underneath its pretty tall off the ground I love it. I'm going to get my daughter one.
customer_reviews.author: melinda69

customer_reviews.title: Definitely NOT a queen size!!!
customer_reviews.text: The label on the box says queen size and the measurements are correct. Unfortunately, what's actually in the box is a twin. Hopefully this is just a mislabeled item as l I have ordered another. Will update my review when it comes in.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Why aren’t zinus headboards & frames aligned to match each other?
customer_reviews.text: Was bent in shipping. Very lightweight. Too much so. Also, does not have holes to match for the zinus headboard I bought to secure to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two years of daily use and no complaints so far
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son from when he transitioned from toddler floor mattress to a twin mattress. We were able to safely attach a guard rail to it too (although not recommended by guard rail), but had zero issues the rail for two years. This bed frame is stable, sturdy, has withstood many nights of a toddler jumping on the bed. It has supported both my son and my husband (200lbs) throughout the night with no issues. It doesn't squeak or creak. Allows for plenty of room underneath for storage (or hiding/cave space for large dogs and toddlers :) I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Won't let me return it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom, who has been in the hospital since December, and we were forced to quickly find and move her to an assisted living facility. I bought this frame, but the measurements were not correct and it won't fit the mattress. NOW I CAN'T RETURN IT. There was NO INDICATION when I purchased this that it could NOT BE RETURNED. I would give a 0 if this allowed me to.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to put together... Very sturdy... And I love it so much better than using a box spring if you ever move houses it will be so easy to pack up and move and a boxspring is large and unwieldy... The price is very reasonable for what you get... I’m not very handy but I could put this together it was super simple. You can use a dust ruffle if you don’t want to see the platform part of the bed... But I don’t use one . I don’t use it for under bed storage... But I’m sure those flat storage boxes would fit under there just fine
customer_reviews.author: Jasmirmom

customer_reviews.title: Great! Lots of storage.
customer_reviews.text: Good points: It holds a heck of a lot of weight with out the frame shifting or feeling like it will collapse. Lots of storage. I have high plastic storage containers under it. Bad points: There is nothing to stop the mattress from sliding around. No high edges or anything. (Video) I moved it this easily with one hand and a broken finger. It might not be so bad with a mattress that has more weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: leslie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: trying to get better at this review thing, so I just got my frame today it was very easy to assemble had no problem took me 7 minutes to put together. my family was jelly (Jealous) of the storage that I now have underneath my bed. it's very sturdy and strong I weigh 210 and I'm 6ft so it works good for me, the only two problems I have is the middle legs for some odd reason don't touch the ground and the frame itself slides to easily but that's ain't a big deal to me simple fix it think...I recommend this bed frame to anyone who's looking for bed storage. (6-10-19) Will update soon
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: So sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This frame doesn't get any easier to assemble. You literally just unfold it, which will also make it great for storage and travel. It's unbelievably sturdy too. I also purchased an 8 inch foam/gel mattress for it and have less than 200 dollars between the two items. I purchased this because my husband snores and days that I have to get up early for work, he crashes here until I get up and then he goes into our king size bed. Not ideal, I know, but it allows us both to get sleep and since he's such a heavy sleeper, he doesn't even remember me waking him to go to our "main bed".
customer_reviews.author: Vixen

customer_reviews.title: Missing bolts kit
customer_reviews.text: Came with the bolts kit required to join the two sub-frames missing in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Haseeb

customer_reviews.title: Great height for storage, needs a guard to keep mattress from moving
customer_reviews.text: My college aged sister is staying with us and she is staying in our smaller room with not too much storage. The height of this frame allows her to have more space for storage for clothes and books. Her bed sits up against a wall so we don’t have to worry about the mattress and box spring sliding off, but this frame set needs some kind of lip/guard around the edge to keep the mattress from moving around.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonSaver

customer_reviews.title: Broke too soon - very frustrated.
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the convenience of this bed frame - it was so easy to put up! But one of the legs broke off less than two months after I got it. It's in my 12 year old daughter's room and she does not jump on her bed or so anything crazy. The whole thing seems kind of flimsy to me so I'm not very happy with this product. I am going to have to buy a whole new frame now.
customer_reviews.author: Kim E. Ruane

customer_reviews.title: Good frame, but the welds are too sharp
customer_reviews.text: Good frame, not noisy, easy to set up, gives lots of storage space. The only thing is that the edges of the supports that are welded to the actual frame are not smooth, and they catch your mattress is you're to slide the mattress around at all. This is of course not preferred, and is an easy way to get snags or tears on your mattress or mattress protector. This is of course an easy fix but annoying that it was neglected.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph G

customer_reviews.title: Conditional quality based on mattress thickness
customer_reviews.text: Please take Note! The frame of this bed is strong enough to carry average weight person easily. However, the short rods are easily bended or broken with a minor touch. If you have a thick mattress that is more than 10 inches, it should distribute the weight evenly enough to prevent any damage to the rods. If you have a thin mattress such as the ones used for guest beds, then this frame will not last long. Don’t buy it at all. Overall, the quality of the frame is also not very well made. There are sharp areas, and joints do not line up evenly. However, the weight of the mattress should create enough pressure to level it during use.
customer_reviews.author: BostonEngineer

customer_reviews.title: NO ISSUES! Good for apartments/2nd floor/small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I could not relate to ANY of the complaints written about this frame. No sharp edges, does not squeak, was easy to assemble, and is sturdy. I put this bed in a corner and have had no issues with sliding. It came in a manageable package size where it could be carried up the stairs and assembled in a small space. NOTE: The bottom height of the bed frame is more like 13 inches if you're trying to store something perfectly under.
customer_reviews.author: Amaz0n Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal. Sturdy. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy to assemble, no tools needed. Full mattress fit perfectly. No funny squeaks or mattress sliding. We put a mattress cover on both sides of the mattress to protect the mattress from metal edges, and also to be able to just flip the mattress without having to take off and put on the mattress protector! Oh, the clearance under the frame is about 13” so watch the height of any under bed storage containers you’re planning to use. Because, count the legs: you’d need 12 bed risers! Still, at this great price, you’ll have extra money for extra bed risers!
customer_reviews.author: Lewie D

customer_reviews.title: Fits in wooden queen bed frame (400lbs two people)
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I have been looking for. Fits perfectly in a wooden frame. See the pics. I am 240lbs and my wife is about 120lbs. Very sturdy. No noises. For several month I didn’t notice that the kids broke my box spring because of jumping on the bed. The sleep was terrible and very noisy as we move on the bed. I purchased this and installed in 5 minutes. This is totally awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Bassam

customer_reviews.title: Super simple to set up
customer_reviews.text: Super simple to set up, and also very sturdy. I like that it's two twin size platforms that are attached. Makes it so much easier if/when I have to transport it. A very satisfactory purchase
customer_reviews.author: MDiaz

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I’m 290 I sleep w a twin air bed on it cause these HUD Apts have bed bugs & I’d just b wasting $ on a new twin Mattress / bed frame every month. I been using these metal bed frames for years. This version is the best u just unfold it 3x then flip it over put a mattress on it. There is another version that comes w screws u have to put on be aware this frame w the red buttons is the best kind
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What A Great Bed Frame
customer_reviews.text: After my first order being lost I ordered this one because first of all the price was great and it was prime and I could get it in two days, I LOVE THAT!! The bed arrived as promised and it was a heavy box, but I figured it because it was made good and that it is. I loved how easy it was to set-up. It's like powdered coated so that means no rust!! There's about a 14 " space under the bed which is great for storage. It seems pretty sturdy and I hope it lasts a super long time!!
customer_reviews.author: PapaJohn

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i needed!!! Excelent quality. Easy to install. Sturdy and stable. I got this frame to my mom who had her bed (box spring and matress on blocks. We were able to get rid of the box spring, which makes her so happy!! She is sleeping much better now. Thanks!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marami

customer_reviews.title: Love the under bed space, great for temp usage, but will squeak after a month
customer_reviews.text: We purchase several amazon basics brands because they tend to flex their supply chain buying power to provide some decent items at low prices. After taking down our kids bunks beds we decided to purchase this folding bed so it could be used until a more permanent solution for our son sleeping arrangements could be met. This frame arrives ready to use and was quick to setup. The under bed storage is perfect and definitely fits sterlite underneath of two shoe boxes stacked on top of each other. The only thing that others have mentioned is the spring squeak over time. It is not a permanent solution but is fitting the bill for now.
customer_reviews.author: Will-Review4U

customer_reviews.title: when you don’t even get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, I guess. I wasn’t expecting anything super nice given the price, but I was expecting it to be halfway decent. It unfolds super easy, but it’s so flimsy it isn’t even worth it. This thing is rated for 250 pounds and I weigh significantly less than that. The very first night it started to sag. It’s also extremely creaky, you can’t move without a ton of noise. As I said, I wasn’t expecting a permanent fix but I thought maybe I’d get 2 or 3 months out of this thing. I don’t think it can even handle that. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very good but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is actually pretty darn good. It fits our queen mattress well and doesn't wiggle all around or walk on us. It is really quite sturdy. I do wish it had something like a lip or something around the perimeter to hold in the mattress better but it only slides because I put a liner in-between the mattress and the frame. The frame does have some holes in it for headboards or something so I might do something there. The folding legs are good and the angle pieces that sturdy up the legs don't take too much room away but they do take some. This is a good cheap bed frame. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy frame
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy frame. But, be aware, if bed is not up against a wall, mattress or box spring (yes, we still use a box spring with this frame) will slide off of frame.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice thing.
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace my daughters large loft bed to stage our home to sell. This is great for that! Very easy to put together and folds easily. Haven’t had issues yet, but the 250lb weight capacity concerns me. I’m a big guy, and my daughter likes me to read to her before bed. Since I’m about 255lbs myself, I hope it doesn’t break. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: MooseKnuckle

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT bed frame
customer_reviews.text: This bed frame is AWESOME! Super duper easy to assemble, took less than 5 minutes to get everything out of the box and put together. Some reviews mentioned the frame not laying flat on top, but I did not encounter this error. I'm super impressed with how sturdy the frame is and how much storage space is underneath. I plan to attach a headboard in the future, which should be simple as there are appropriate holes in the frame to do so. I highly recommend this bed frame. For reference, I purchased the California King size and everything is accurate. Thank you Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Flawed, But I'll Take It
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty easy to set up. If you're looking for a cheap platform bed frame, this will do the job. After getting mine all set up, I did notice that the middle legs were not touching the ground. After checking to make sure everything was tightened and pulled out all the way, I then thought that maybe once the weight of a mattress was on top it would sort itself out: It didn't. The way it fits together is just off for some reason. So there is the annoyance of the middle leg hitting the floor when you first get into bed or sit on it, etc., but it works for my purposes and didn't cost a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L Cramer

customer_reviews.title: My Second Order
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Queen frame in 2018. It's sturdy. The legs doesn't scratch my hardwood floors. It's quiet (I mean it doesn't make ANY noise even during those intimate moments). Compared to my neighbors above me who have a similar frame it makes noise every time they roll over in their bed, I can hear it. I totally forgot about how much storage is under the bed until I came back here to buy a second one for my Mom. I will definitely be shoving things underneath it now. And it's super easy to assemble. Just lay it on the floor, fold the legs out and flip it over.
customer_reviews.author: S. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Quality
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a portable, easy to assemble sturdy platform mattress frame, you may want to seriously consider this. We bought it for a queen size mattress just before we moved. It was quite easy to assemble in a few minutes. One reviewer stated that their mattress had slightly ripped when mattress was placed on the frame. An easy fix to that is to buy whatever size mattress foam from target or any store that sales such/not expensive. It works great! Really good product at a really good price!
customer_reviews.author: sleekbass

customer_reviews.title: CHECK THE WEIGHT LIMIT!
customer_reviews.text: CHECK THE WEIGHT LIMIT! it says only 250 pound limit for the king size frame. That would only hold the ling size mattress and one person. I immediately returned it once it was delivered
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Bought from Amazon Warehouse which usually has good stuff, especially when listed as "very good" as this was. I saved $4 on this, not much, and not worth it. Frame had a big bend in a major crossmember 3/4 inch off true and one of the smaller wires was broken off. Able to use but not "very good." Guess they ran a forklift into it. Was triple boxed with thick cardboard. It was so heavy I could barely get it up the stairs step by step. After removing the boxing it became almost light. That boxing added 35% to the weight.
customer_reviews.author: jackstraw

customer_reviews.title: Easy as 1-2-3!
customer_reviews.text: Talk about the QUICKEST set up ever... this frame is AMAZING!! Once it's out of the package, cut a zip-tie, take off a few cardboard protectors, open the frame and lock the legs in place-- DONE. Sturdy frame so it doesn't wobble like most basic frames.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great bed frame! Go Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! My 12 year old daughter assembled this in 15 min. No tools needed. I put 8 storage bins underneath. I sleep like a dream.. Excellent purchase. Would buy again! Run dont walk and get this. Im 5'7, so i hop into bed.. might be tough for a shorter person.. we are tall for women at 5'7, so it sits nice and high. Im impressed. Additionally I bought a bed in a box, a queen by Zinus with no box spring. Don't need it. This is so perfect and regular comforter works well. I bought my daughter the Zinus Casey 18 inch similar to this, also great. Great jib Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom, I.T. Professional

customer_reviews.title: Good product for price
customer_reviews.text: Make sure if you buy this you buy a board to put on it before you place your mattress , the metal will tear your mattress other than that great product and I weigh 210 and hubby weighs 155 so it holds weight and don’t bend sturdy and comfortable easy to assemble just pull and stretch and it locks in place with plenty of storage space under neath need to buy storage collapsible to store blankets or clothes or even a shoe rack highly recommend they shave edges of metal if not careful you could get scratched up assembling.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzie ortiz

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Assembly? It was just like the video. I just took it out of the box then out of the bag , unfolded it, put the mattress on it. I slept on it alone the first night and it was the first 8 contiguous hours in a long time. The frame appears to be rugged enough to withstand two medium (200x2) adults moving rigorously. But I may have to put small blocks of wood under the feet to protect the carpet. The extra height will add extra storage room?
customer_reviews.author: R. DuMond

customer_reviews.title: Horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: Missing bolts. Son away at school and can’t get it together. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Slovak

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend this
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely great value for the money. I like the fact that it is so high enough that my 80 pound pitbull can have his secret hideaway under it with no problems and comfortably. I originally bought it so high so that my dog nacho would stop jumping on my bed. But he’s too smart for that he still found away. Other people have been complaining about it being noisy and squeaky but I have not had this issue. If you want to move your bed somewhere else the bedframe is collapsible and easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Calpaint

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, sturdy, convenient, low cost solution
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, surprisingly sturdy. Assembling and getting rid of beds / frames is one of the jobs I dislike most intensely - they are usually unwieldy, difficult to dispose of or assemble. This one took literally minutes to put together. No need for a box spring, mattress sits comfortably and securely on the top, no shifting around. Saves a heck lot of money for someone who is not trying to make a big statement with their bed furniture. I am planning to get another one for my son's dorm room - will be easy to transport in a four door sedan, try doing that with a full size bed.
customer_reviews.author: Subrata Chakravarty

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I mean it does what it's supposed to? It's a bed frame lol. I have kind of horrible dust allergies, and the carpet traps SO much. This is comfortably high, I'm great! It's so much better than sleeping on the floor lol. My dog (45lbs) is TERRIFIED of thunder storms, and she's crawled under it before during them, so double thumbs up for that! It seems pretty sturdy, and it's easy enough to move (we moved it between rooms). It only took a few minutes to put up and was fairly simple. Totally recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: C. P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly, Movable, Lots of Storage and Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second. My first was a twin size that I bought 5 years ago. I used it for 3 years, then gave it to my mom. She loves it as well. My twin became a little squeaky but I sleep like the dead so it never bothered me. It's comfortable, easy to tote around (mine went to Virginia, Texas, and the Carolinas). Good storage space underneath. When I got my new one, which is a full, it looks like they changed a bit of the construction. There are now plastic bits to hold it open. Made me a little nervous, but I've had it for a couple of months now and so far they're holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Tiddleyboom

customer_reviews.title: I was about to give this 5 stars, but....
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews carefully. There are metal shards that poke out from the thin spines of the frame. They are also colored black, so they are difficult to see. If you run your fingers along the frame, you might cut yourself. If you do not find them and file them down, they will snag and tear your mattress cover (and let all those fiberglass particles escape into your room). For this reason alone, I dislike the product and would not recommend it, because it will damage your mattress, and now who will compensate???
customer_reviews.author: D.Wo

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics Foldable, 14" Metal Platform Bed Frame with Tool-Free Assembly, No Box Spring Needed - Twin
product_meta.description: Size:Twin| Style:14-InchGet a more restful night’s sleep with help from the AmazonBasics Platform Bed Frame, Black. The sturdy bed frame features a raised, rectangular-shaped design with horizontal panels and cross rows of wires that effectively support a mattress without the need for a box spring. The well-made bed frame sets up quickly and easily (no tools required), and it accommodates sleepers up to 250 pounds. Typical bed frames require a box spring and leave minimal space underneath for storage. The platform bed frame, however, offers the same comfortable crawl-into-bed height, but it doesn’t require a box spring, which means a height clearance of about 13 inches underneath. Effortlessly slide boxes, storage bins, drawers, and more under the bed for easy-to-access, out-of-the-way storage space. Unlike other bed frames that can be squeaky, the AmazonBasics platform bed frame ensures quiet, noise-free support, even when rolling over from one side to the other during the night.
feature_bullets: Product Dimensions: 75" L x 39" W x 14" H | Weight: 26.3 pounds
Designed for sleepers up to 250 pounds
Twin platform bed frame offers a quiet, noise-free, supportive foundation for a mattress. No box spring needed
Folding mechanism makes the frame easy to store and move in tight spaces
Provides extra under-the-bed storage space with a vertical clearance of about 13 inches
Made of durable steel with a sleek black finish

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars20,018 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
